## Importing data

This tutorial will cover the basics of importing data into R. It is largely based on [chapters 20-23](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/import) of the book "R for Data Science" by Hadley Wickham and Garrett Grolemund.


csv, spreadsheets, databases, hierarchical data
